Method.name: TestGetLink
Method.Implementation:
s link = ##class(Forum.Forum).GetLink("Test sentence")
do $$$AssertEquals(link,"http://www.sql.ru/forum/Test sentence","Test for creating link")

Method.name: TestInsert
Method.Implementation:
s data("Name") = "Testing Name"
s status = ##class(Forum.Forum).NameExists( data("Name"), .tmpId ) if status = 1 { d ##class(Forum.Forum).%DeleteId( tmpId ) k status, tmpId }
s sc = ##class(Forum.Forum).Insert( .data )
s forumObj = ##class(Forum.Forum).%OpenId( data )
do $$$AssertEquals(forumObj.Name,data("Name"),"Testing Forum's property ""Name""")
s st = ##class(Forum.Forum).%DeleteId( data ) do $$$AssertTrue(st,"Delete created object")
